name: Black Forest Cake
description: A famous German dessert consisting of several layers of chocolate sponge cake sandwiched with whipped cream and cherries. It is decorated with additional whipped cream, chocolate shavings, and cherries.
steps: Bake chocolate sponge cakes and let them cool.
Cut the cakes into layers and sprinkle each with cherry schnapps.
Whip cream with sugar and vanilla until stiff peaks form.
Assemble the cake by alternating layers of cake with whipped cream and cherries.
Decorate the top with whipped cream, chocolate shavings, and whole cherries.
tips: Ensure the sponge cake is completely cool before cutting to prevent crumbling.
Chill the bowl and beaters before whipping the cream for best results.
Allow the cake to set in the refrigerator for a few hours to make slicing easier.
